title: Deploy an application through `quarkus-openshift` extension is using `Quarkus-kubernetes` exetension
body:
### Describe the bug

Quarkus version: Upstream (`999-SNAPSHOT`)
Openshift 4.11

Works as expected with Quarkus 2.14.3.Final

Description:

When I deploy a Quarkus application through `quarkus-openshift` I am getting the following error

Error:
```
13:13:30,663 INFO  oc: View details with 'oc describe <resource>/<name>' or list resources with 'oc get all'.
13:13:30,666 INFO  Running command: oc get events -n ts-nlmvicjjxv
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: LAST SEEN   TYPE      REASON              OBJECT                     MESSAGE
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: 76s         Normal    Scheduled           pod/app-1-build            Successfully assigned ts-nlmvicjjxv/app-1-build to ocp4-11-qvqg4-worker-0-sbvxp by ocp4-11-qvqg4-master-1
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: 74s         Normal    AddedInterface      pod/app-1-build            Add eth0 [10.129.3.122/23] from openshift-sdn
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: 74s         Normal    Pulled              pod/app-1-build            Container image "quay.io/openshift-release-dev/ocp-v4.0-art-dev@sha256:2cbbf6bff06a9897b3188b6df9705879bd99ba17ea7de8090fc68f2260451c04" already present on machine
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: 74s         Normal    Created             pod/app-1-build            Created container git-clone
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: 74s         Normal    Started             pod/app-1-build            Started container git-clone
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: 63s         Normal    Pulled              pod/app-1-build            Container image "quay.io/openshift-release-dev/ocp-v4.0-art-dev@sha256:2cbbf6bff06a9897b3188b6df9705879bd99ba17ea7de8090fc68f2260451c04" already present on machine
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: 63s         Normal    Created             pod/app-1-build            Created container manage-dockerfile
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: 63s         Normal    Started             pod/app-1-build            Started container manage-dockerfile
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: 62s         Normal    Pulled              pod/app-1-build            Container image "quay.io/openshift-release-dev/ocp-v4.0-art-dev@sha256:2cbbf6bff06a9897b3188b6df9705879bd99ba17ea7de8090fc68f2260451c04" already present on machine
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: 62s         Normal    Created             pod/app-1-build            Created container sti-build
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: 62s         Normal    Started             pod/app-1-build            Started container sti-build
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: 73s         Normal    BuildStarted        build/app-1                Build ts-nlmvicjjxv/app-1 is now running
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: 39s         Normal    BuildCompleted      build/app-1                Build ts-nlmvicjjxv/app-1 completed successfully
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: 34s         Normal    Scheduled           pod/app-94764cfff-77pv2    Successfully assigned ts-nlmvicjjxv/app-94764cfff-77pv2 to ocp4-11-qvqg4-worker-0-sbvxp by ocp4-11-qvqg4-master-1
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: 32s         Normal    AddedInterface      pod/app-94764cfff-77pv2    Add eth0 [10.129.3.123/23] from openshift-sdn
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: 16s         Normal    Pulling             pod/app-94764cfff-77pv2    Pulling image "ts-nlmvicjjxv/app:1.0.0-SNAPSHOT"
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: 16s         Warning   Failed              pod/app-94764cfff-77pv2    Failed to pull image "ts-nlmvicjjxv/app:1.0.0-SNAPSHOT": rpc error: code = Unknown desc = reading manifest 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT in 10.0.214.155:5000/ts-nlmvicjjxv/app: manifest unknown: manifest unknown
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: 16s         Warning   Failed              pod/app-94764cfff-77pv2    Error: ErrImagePull
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: 2s          Normal    BackOff             pod/app-94764cfff-77pv2    Back-off pulling image "ts-nlmvicjjxv/app:1.0.0-SNAPSHOT"
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: 2s          Warning   Failed              pod/app-94764cfff-77pv2    Error: ImagePullBackOff
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: 36s         Warning   FailedCreate        replicaset/app-94764cfff   Error creating: pods "app-94764cfff-" is forbidden: error looking up service account ts-nlmvicjjxv/app: serviceaccount "app" not found
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: 34s         Normal    SuccessfulCreate    replicaset/app-94764cfff   Created pod: app-94764cfff-77pv2
13:13:31,520 INFO  oc: 37s         Normal    ScalingReplicaSet   deployment/app             Scaled up replica set app-94764cfff to 1

```

Workaround: 
Set you docker registry URL into your application.properties
`quarkus.container-image.registry=image-registry.openshift-image-registry.svc:5000`




### Expected behavior

Same behavior as Quarkus 2.14.3.Final

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

`git clone git@github.com:quarkus-qe/quarkus-test-suite.git`

`cd /quarkus-test-suite/config`

`mvn clean verify -Dit.test=OpenShiftFileSystemConfigSecretConfigIT`


### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Linux fedora 6.0.11-200.fc36.x86_64

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "17.0.5" 2022-10-18 OpenJDK Runtime Environment Temurin-17.0.5+8 (build 17.0.5+8)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

_No response_

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
